bibl.title: Alexandria and Alexandrianism. Papers Delivered at a Symposium Organized by The J. Paul Getty Museum and The Getty Center for the History of Art and the Humanities and Held at the Museum. April 22-25, 1993.
bibl.note: 19 papers. - Foreword by John WALSH and Thomas F. REESE. - Introduction. - The City of Alexandria in the Hellenistic Period. - Arts of Hellenistic Alexandria: Greek and Egyptian Contributions. - The Continuing Influence of Alexandria.
bibl.seg: Alexandria and Alexandrianism. Papers Delivered at a Symposium Organized by The J. Paul Getty Museum and The Getty Center for the History of Art and the Humanities and Held at the Museum. April 22-25, 1993.
Malibu, The J. Paul Getty Museum, 1996, 4°, x-302 pp., nombr. figg., 1 carte dépl. ISBN 0-89236-292-8. $50.

19 papers. - Foreword by John WALSH and Thomas F. REESE. - Introduction. - The City of Alexandria in the Hellenistic Period. - Arts of Hellenistic Alexandria: Greek and Egyptian Contributions. - The Continuing Influence of Alexandria.
